  • Classes in org.bubblecloud.zigbee.api used by org.bubblecloud.zigbee.api 
    Class and Description
    ClusterFactory 
    ClusterFactoryBase 
    Device 
    DeviceBase
    This class represent a generic Home Automation Device as defined by the document ZigBee Home Automation public release version 075123r01ZB
    DeviceDescription
    This class represent static description associated to a generic Home Automation Device as defined by the document ZigBee Home Automation public release version 075123r01ZB
    DeviceFactory
    This class represent the main interface for the extendable architecture of the refinement driver.
    DeviceFactoryBase 
    DeviceFactoryImpl
    Generic class that simplify the creation of factory, and avoids the creation of a class for each factory that we want to register

  • Classes in org.bubblecloud.zigbee.api used by org.bubblecloud.zigbee.api.cluster.impl.event 
    Class and Description
    ReportingConfiguration
    The interface of the service registered by the Home Automation Driver architecture which is used to provides among all the bundles composing the Home Automation Driver, (i.e.: core drivers and driver extension) the default configuration of the reporting.
